pages.text:
ABOUT
We Can’t Wait to Welcome You Home!
Located in lovely Lakeland, Florida, you can now enjoy the luxury of Bonny Shores—a 55+ manufactured home community nestled among beautiful lakes, sprawling wildlife and state parks! Conveniently situated along I-4 between Tampa and Orlando, Lakeland is just a short drive to Disney World, Sea World and many other Orlando-area attractions.
Column one
Column two
Thrive in Florida’s Idyllic Residential community
Resting on the beautiful waters of Lake Bonny, Bonny Shores is the perfect place to enjoy Florida’s fabulous, warm, year-round weather. Our community provides attractive, pre-owned manufactured homes and our pet-friendly environment includes fabulous amenities such as a clubhouse, outdoor games, and a variety of on-going, community activities.
If you’re looking for a resort away from the hustle and bustle of life, we invite you to preview the homes for sale at Bonny Shores! You’ll soon discover that your dreams of living the best years of your life are fully attainable!
Curious to Learn More?
Contact Us
